Home / Projects / Music

Music

Simple music player written in C++ / Qt 5 / QML. UI design shamelessly ripped off from Amberol.

Features

  • Plays FLAC and MP3 files
  • Drag and drop to add files to the playlist
  • Displays album art
  • Automatic light and dark mode

Source

The source code for Music is available on GitHub.

License

Music uses the Zero-Clause BSD license.
